entity.description: Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi

text:
@RahulGandhi Week after week, supporters of Modi slapped down criticisms of his handling of Covid-19 and maintained the issue should remain apolitical.

This image should be a damning conviction for even the most ardent Bhakts. https://t.co/7yPSHp6RR0
